content.question: Which of the following explains the most likely purpose of Gonzalo’s answer to the second question in the interview?

choices.label: To call for the prosecution of those responsible for mass violence in Peru
To challenge the continued political influence of Western states in Latin America
To justify the Shining Path’s use of violence to achieve its political objectives
To appeal to politicians in Latin American states to adopt reforms to their respective political institutions

content.answer: To justify the Shining Path’s use of violence to achieve its political objectives
